main.name: Steffan Crowe
main.description: with over 10 years' experience developing performance-critical software and leading engineering teams.
main.bio: I am a highly skilled Software Engineer with over 10 years’ experience in developing robust applications using C#, .NET, and modern frameworks. I’ve recently led a successful engineering team and continue to push my knowledge through self-driven projects in blockchain, trading automation, and backend optimization.
main.contactmessage: If you wish to get in touch, please send me an email at steffan.crowe@hotmail.co.uk

resume.skillmessage: Please download my CV for a more detailed summary of my skills

education.description: For my dissertation I created a 3D physics engine which involved researching the required physics laws and equations, and the various algorithms that can be applied in calculating collision detections in a 3D environment.

work.title: Engineering Supervisor / Software Engineer
work.description: Led and mentored an engineering team while delivering full-stack applications using C#, .NET, React Native, and GitHub Actions. Oversaw a key migration to Git and CI/CD pipelines. Developed performance-critical software used globally to configure and monitor industrial engine controllers.

work.title: Video Associate
work.description: Assisted in creating and processing video advertisements. Solved customer queries over email and phone, requiring strong technical and creative problem-solving skills.

work.title: Crypto Trading Platform Developer
work.description: Built an automated cryptocurrency trading platform using ASP.NET (.NET 8), BigQuery, and a custom Solana RPC node. Implemented data pipelines, trading strategies, genetic algorithm-based optimization, and messaging between real-time components.
